body:
It's not in this PR, but I noticed that we're removing approvals when a recipe is changed via the API.
1. Do we want to move this to the model level and remove it when it's saved?
2. There are some recipe changes that have no effect on the recipe as run by users and should not remove approval, such as changing the name of the recipe. There's a library called [django-dirtyfields](https://github.com/romgar/django-dirtyfields) that can help detect what fields are changing in a model before it's saved; perhaps we want a whitelist of acceptable changes?
